content: Yes, so that was an internal memo that we werenât intending to share publicly, and as such, had a number of aspirational goals really designed to rally the team, especially at a time when weâre restructuring and refocusing our business, itâs really important for our team to see the enormous opportunity that we have in front of us, whether thatâs reaccelerating our revenue growth by improving our direct response business, better monetizing the enormous amount of AR engagement that we see, obviously, in our camera, and continuing to grow and build on Snapchat+.
